sense.def:
To interpret something in a particular way
pomeni spoznati, da je značaj ali pomen nečesa tak in nič drugačen.

seg.quote: I'm not quite sure how to interpret that question.
The election result is being interpreted as a serious setback for the government.

sense.def:
To interpret what someone is saying
pomeni takoj prevesti tisto, kar nekdo govori, v drug jezik.

seg.quote: He interpreted the opening words of section 16.
Paul had to interpret for us.
